summary: compiler plugin for some Borland compilers
name: borland.vim--Maerz
description: Contains a single errorformat for all supported compilers, as well as detailed settings/comments for each.Supported/tested compilers : - Turbo C 2.0; Borland C 3.1, 5.2; CBuilder 4, 5;- Turbo Pascal 7.0; Delphi 5, 6; Kylix 1.0;- Free pascal 1.0 (GNU)
